title: Order is gunna win and here's why

Fixing fans, and giving a fan their fix.

Nah. Chaos dictates that things should be wild and free. :^)
chaos doesn't dictate anything, its chaos.
this pitcure mad me honry

Order dictates freedom?
Does that mean chaos dictates justice?

light, order, creation/birth/rebirth
darkness, chaos, death

Which is stronger?
Chaos dictates nothing, Because when surrounded in chaos you can truly do nothing, save hold on.
That's not exactly what "Chaos" stands for though.
Meh, I still think order dictating freedom sounds wrong.

This is why Order is gonna lose, false promises.

Chaos makes no such false promises.
I was promised smutty pics for Chaos, too. :\
I wasn't tho.
Yasuo is not evil, Riven is. Evil refers to the loser, Justice refers to the victor. The method doesn't matter, the loser is the evil one.
Neither is evil. They're both just confused.
Whenever that problem comes up, the best solution is to kiss. Works every time.

If Yasuo isn't evil, why is he chaos?

Chaos isn't evil. Evil is usualy chaotic.
The whole UNIVERSE, the endless void of space, Nature itself is CHAOTIC!!! Is the universe EVIL?

> [{quoted}](name=Gakupo,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=JwjIerEb,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2017-06-22T11:53:26.834+0000)
>
> If Yasuo isn't evil, why is he chaos?

Chaos does not refer to "Evil" and Order does not refer to "Good", its stated in their own VO that both of them consider themselves to be the good one, while they consider the other Evil, Chaos and Order are ways of living, and Yasuo and Riven are Advocates for each,
Chaos is Freedom, while Order is Conforming.
The only reason I picked Order is because it's not Yasuo.
